::: {#hero-heading}
<div class="h1">Tinani!</div>

I'm an ecologist. I combine field, lab and computational methods to try to understand what threatens wildlife populations and what makes them thrive. At present, I'm a PhD candidate in the [Behavioural & Evolutionary Ecology of Birds](https://petersresearchgroup.org/) research group at Monash University, where I study population dynamics and conservation, focussing on the [purple-crowned fairy-wren](https://ebird.org/species/pucfai2).
